#summary Inserts a VCF in a sqlite3 database


Inserts a VCF in a sqlite3 database.

==Dependencies==

[http://www.sqlite.org/ http://www.sqlite.org/] : libraries and header.
Define `SQLITE_LIB` and 
`SQLITE_CFLAGS` in `config.mk` (see [HowToInstall HowToInstall] )

==Options==

  * -f (file) sqlite database (*REQUIRED*).


==Schema==

A schema is available in [http://variationtoolkit.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/doc/schema01.svg]

==Example:==


{{{
$ vcf2sqlite -f db.sqlite file.vcf
$ sqlite3 -line db.sqlite  "select * from VCFCALL LIMIT 4"

       id = 1
   nIndex = 0
vcfrow_id = 1
sample_id = 1
     prop = GT
    value = 1/1

       id = 2
   nIndex = 1
vcfrow_id = 1
sample_id = 1
     prop = PL
    value = 46,6,0

       id = 3
   nIndex = 2
vcfrow_id = 1
sample_id = 1
     prop = GQ
    value = 10

       id = 4
   nIndex = 0
vcfrow_id = 2
sample_id = 1
     prop = GT
    value = 1/1


}}}
